Package src

Class MetricsGraph

java.lang.Object
src.MetricsGraph
class MetricsGraph extends Object
A complete undirected weighted graph with the edge weights being equal to the planar or cartesian distance of two nodes

  • Constructor Details

    • MetricsGraph

      MetricsGraph​(Horse[] horses, Aircraft plane, GraphNode paris, DistFunction distanceFunction)
      Creates a complete undirected weighted graph with the edge weights being equal to the planar or cartesian distance of two nodes
      Parameters:
      horses - the array of the horses
      plane - the plane of this graph
      paris - paris
      distanceFunction - the distance function to be used

  • Method Details

    • getWeight

      double getWeight​(int start, int end) throws NullPointerException
      Gets the distance between nodes Note that horses start at index = 2! (excl. mark not factorial)
      Parameters:
      start - one node's index
      end - second node's index
      Returns:
      the distance
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - dunno when, might happen someday

      Returns:

    • getHorse

      public Horse getHorse​(int index)
      Returns the horse at the given index
      note that horses start at index = 2
      Parameters:
      index - index of the horse
      Returns:
      horse at the given index

    • isVisited

      public boolean isVisited​(int i)
      If the horse is already visited, returns true
      Parameters:
      i - index of horse
      Returns:
      true if visited, false otherwise

    • allVisited

      public boolean allVisited()
      Returns whether all horses are visited
      Returns:
      true if all horses are visited, else return false

    • atHorse

      public boolean atHorse()
      Returns:
      true, if the plane is currently at a horse's location

    • atParis

      public boolean atParis()
      Returns:
      true, if the plane is currently in paris

    • atStart

      public boolean atStart()
      Returns:
      true, if the plane is at its starting position

    • getTime

      public double getTime()
      Getter for time
      Returns:
      current time

    • getCurrentlyAt

      public int getCurrentlyAt()
      Returns:
      the index of the node the plane is currently at

    • unloadInParis

      public void unloadInParis()
      Unloads all horses in Paris and for all loaded horses, increases the time This method does not fly the plane to paris!

    • load

      public void load​(int i)
      Loads a single horse and increases the time
      Parameters:
      i - horse index

    • flyTo

      public void flyTo​(int i)
      Flies the plane to the node and increases the time according to the speed and distance also marks the node as visited and updates the currentlyAt position to the node index
      Parameters:
      i - the node to fly to
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when i == PLANE_INDEX
      RuntimeException - when flying to a horse already visited

    • visit

      private void visit​(int i)
      If the node is not already visited:
      marks the node as visited and increases the number of visited nodes
      Parameters:
      i - node

    • timeFromVelAndDist

      private double timeFromVelAndDist​(double velocity, double dist)
      A simple function to calculate the time knowing the velocity and distance
      Parameters:
      velocity - the velocity
      dist - the distance
      Returns:
      the time: time = distance/velocity
